name: Completion of the Cologne Cathedral
reverse_inscriptions: Der dom zu köln, begonnen 1248, vollendet 1880.
description: Construction of Cologne Cathedral commenced in 1248 and was halted in 1473, leaving it unfinished.
Work restarted in the 19th century and was completed, to the original plan, in 1880.
The cathedral is the largest Gothic church in Northern Europe and has the second-tallest spires.
